text: Charles Ronald Norgle Sr. (born March 6, 1937) is an American politician and lawyer. He is a United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Northern District of Illinois since 1984 after being nominated by President Ronald Reagan. Norgle was born in Chicago. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:Politicians from Chicago
title: Charles Ronald Norgle Sr.
